Package network.errors

package network.errors
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    network
     
    network.parameters
     
    network.rmi
     
  • Exception Classes
    Class
    Description
    ClientAlreadyConnectedException
    ClientAlreadyConnectedException is used to throw an exception when a client is already connected to the server.
    ClientAlreadyIdentifiedException
    Exception thrown when a client tries to identify itself but is already identified.
    ClientConnectedButNotFoundException
    Exception thrown when a client was connected but not found anymore at reconnection
    ClientNeverConnectedException
    ClientNeverConnectedException is used to throw an exception when requesting a client that never connected to the server.
    ClientNotFoundException
    ClientNeverConnectedException is used to throw an exception when a client is never connected to the server.
    ClientNotIdentifiedException
    ClientNotIdentifiedException is used to throw an exception when a client has not identified itself to the server.
    DisconnectedClientException
    DisconnectedClientException is used to throw an exception when a client is disconnected from the server.
    InvalidUsernameException
    Exception thrown when the username is either too long, empty or contains a reserved keyword
    ServerDisconnectedException
    ServerDisconnectedException is used to throw an exception when the server is disconnected from the client.
    WrongParametersException
    Exception thrown when the parameters of a method are not the expected ones
